name: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker
description:
Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using block breaking logic.

IN THE ZONE


Smash those blocks non-stop and be amazed seeing the image slowly being revealed in real-time as the pile shrinks. A relaxing experience that keeps you totally engrossed. Your brain's gonna be like, "Just one more section, please!"

AT YOUR PACE

The interface was carefully designed to give you total freedom. Pick which part of the image to uncover, how many waves of blocks to bust, and how many will pop up from the bottom. Do not flood yourself!

MAKE IT YOUR GAME

Use your own images as stages! Hang out with your favorite pics or the curated list of +30 preloaded images as long as you like.

EXTRA FEATURES


  • Preview strip - Your upcoming piece is always at eye level. Less eye travelling and more focus.
  • Undo key - Made a mistake? No problem! Less frustration, more fun.
  • No Game Over - Checkpoints make sure you won't lose your progress.
  • Unlock Edit mode - after completing the stage.
